tool_description: Real-time and historical data of stocks, cryptocurrencies and forex based on multiple data sources such as Yahoo Finance
name: Real-Time Quotes
title: Real-Time Quotes

api_list.name: Forex symbols
api_list.description: Returns a list of all available foreign exchange currencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-quotes1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/symbol/forex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-quotes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-quotes1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/symbol/forex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-quotes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
